project.name: C-C828A-SUBV-08-ST04-DT03-DF06-CF03-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to get a key in order to read in data from shared memory. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C828A-SUBV-08-ST04-DT03-DF06-CF03-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: create a repository This weakness expects a string in the form: '<file1> <data>' where file1 is a file used to delay execution, and data is a string containing no spaces. Using an asyncronous unsafe signal handler that accesses a char* without checking for a null pointer creates a vulnerability if it is called in a section where the variable is temporarily set to null. In order to hit the weakness, file1 must be a FIFO file controlled by runFifo.py, and the input string must have length > 50 char. In addition a signal must be sent to the process after it creates a file testData/*.pid.

process.script: nohup shm_setup -k 9768 -s 119 -m "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/file1 What_is_the_answer_to_life,_the_universe,_and_everything?" -o /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.out 2>&1 & echo $! > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid && echo "Shared memory created"

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid") && echo "Killed shared memory server."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory server PID file does not exist."; fi

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id" ]]; then ipcrm -m $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id") && echo "Deleted shared memory segment."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory ID file does not exist."; fi

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/preprocess_daemon_script_01.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/preprocess_daemon_script_01.pid") && echo "Killed script."; else echo "Failed: Script PID file does not exist."; fi

scoring_formula.formula: STDOUT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C828A-SUBV-08-ST04-DT03-DF06-CF03-01-GOOD-02
iopair.description: commit a file This weakness expects a string in the form: '<file1> <data>' where file1 is a file used to delay execution, and data is a string containing no spaces. Using an asyncronous unsafe signal handler that accesses a char* without checking for a null pointer creates a vulnerability if it is called in a section where the variable is temporarily set to null. In order to hit the weakness, file1 must be a FIFO file controlled by runFifo.py, and the input string must have length > 50 char. In addition a signal must be sent to the process after it creates a file testData/*.pid.

process.script: nohup shm_setup -k 9768 -s 119 -m "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/file1 This_string_is_most_definitely_longer_than_50_char,_I_wonder_what_will_happen?" -o /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.out 2>&1 & echo $! > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid && echo "Shared memory created"
cd ../good-02 && cp file.txt stonesoup && cd stonesoup && $SS_TC_DEPS/bin/svn add file.txt

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid") && echo "Killed shared memory server."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory server PID file does not exist."; fi

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id" ]]; then ipcrm -m $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id") && echo "Deleted shared memory segment."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory ID file does not exist."; fi

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/preprocess_daemon_script_01.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/preprocess_daemon_script_01.pid") && echo "Killed script."; else echo "Failed: Script PID file does not exist."; fi

scoring_formula.formula: CHECKOUT AND ADD AND COMMIT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
